quotes.quote: "AS LONG AS YOU'RE GOING TO BED WITH US IT'S FINE" — Pitch, Dec. 22, 2020
"Let's go make out in my basement already" — Pitch, Jan. 26, 2021
"Oh yes baby push my button" — Pitch, Sept. 23, 2020
"it was "the kind of song I'd make out to on a trance party" [...] if I'm on a couch I'd do other stuff" — Pitch, Sept. 6, 2020
"All the commands to engage in a nice group hug orgy are present and I think if there's nice music for group hug orgies this might be it too." — Pitch, Feb. 23, 2021
"...after us the lovely Nifra will be the other part of the sandwich that I'm in. Right in between Fisherman and Nifra. So cool to be sandwiched between these two." — Pitch, Valentine's Day, 2021
"...yes, yes, somebody likes it rough...somebody likes it very rough..." — Pitch, Sept. 8, 2020 (Make-out Hour)
"I want to make out with strangers in a dungeon" — Pitch, Aug. 25, 2020
"...how can I make out when I'm jumping? Well, I think it's kinda possible but you have to be a really good multitasker if you wanna do it, I agree." — Pitch, Aug. 25, 2020

"I once dreamt of a threesome, and then I made this mashup" — Pitch, Dec. 8, 2020 ("I mean, I dreamt of a threesome of tracks, you know, three tracks and then I made a mashup of these three tracks, you know, there's really nothing special about that. Just three tracks, nicely in a threesome, that's all.")
"...maybe I should call this show the 'hug orgy' show or something. [...] Let's make it happen in real life soon!" — Pitch, March 2, 2021
